name: Captain Sidequest
description: Constantly abandons the main mission to help with trivial problems like lost cats or broken vending machines.

name: The Incredible Mildman
description: Has slightly above-average strength, stamina, and confidence, but only on Tuesdays.

name: Doctor Delay
description: Can stop time for everyone except himself, yet always uses it to procrastinate.

name: Lady Loophole
description: Her powers activate only through overly specific technicalities in villain contracts or ancient prophecies.

name: Professor Squeak
description: Communicates fluently with mice, who are surprisingly unionized and hard to negotiate with.

name: The Human Pop-Up Ad
description: Appears at the worst possible moment to promote something irrelevant, distracting heroes and villains alike.

name: Sir Overreacts-a-Lot
description: Turns minor inconveniences into city-wide emergencies through sheer dramatic flair.

name: Madam Stopwatch
description: Can perfectly predict how long anything will take, but no one ever believes her.

name: Thunder Nap
description: Gains godlike power after sleeping for exactly 14 hours, then immediately needs another nap.

name: The Beige Shadow
description: Masters the art of being so boring and unremarkable that enemies completely forget he exists.
